review: Ive had this box for a few weeks now and I can honestly say I really enjoy it.Several issues that I encountered:1. When I first started using it, I had a really hard time with the apps. I kept getting errors with downloading Netflix. After spending about 30 mins on the phone with tech support we finally figured it out. I had to unregister myself from the box and reregister.2. Trying to find apps to download seemed a bit cumbersome. I ended up just going on amazon with my laptop and downloaded it from there.3. Connection seems pretty fast and ALMOST immediate. I have had some issues with the box losing connection which is why I deducted 1 star. It is very annoying to constantly have to go back to the home screen and have the box search for signal several times during an episode.
